company.name: EAAC Training and Consulting Group
company.description: Leading provider of vocational training and consultancy services in Egypt, passionate about equipping individuals with the skills and knowledge they need to thrive in dynamic fields.
company.accreditation: Accredited center delivering Pearson BTEC Higher National Diploma (HND) and Higher National Certificate (HNC) qualifications

vision.title: Vision
vision.content: To be a leading center of excellence in engineering education, empowering individuals to achieve their full potential and contribute meaningfully to the industry.

mission.title: Mission
mission.content: To provide students with a comprehensive and practical learning experience, equipping them with the technical knowledge, and hands-on training necessary to excel in their chosen engineering careers.

alexandria.address: Villa No. 132 Tiba St., Sporting Al-Soghra, Alexandria, Egypt

keyFeatures.title: 1500+ Courses
keyFeatures.description: Enjoy a variety of fresh topics
